sentences.sContent: Detectives are liaising with police following the bomb explosion early today.
sentences.sCn: 在今天早些时候炸弹爆炸之后侦探们就一直在联络警方。

trans.tranCn: 做联络人； 联络， 联系
trans.tranOther: to exchange information with someone who works in another organization or department so that you can both be more effective
